CLOCKWORK ANGEL

8″W x 8″H x 2″D 8 x 8 wall hanging for the renaissance gallery’s “Pigments & Pieces” Show, which features paintings, photograph, and sculpture under 12″ x 12″.

  • Turkish Glass
  • Brass Parts
  • Resin
  • Amethyst Crystals
  • Clock Parts
  • Antique Pocket Watch Parts
  • Vintage Jewelry
